website_summaries.verdict: Choose between a plethora of weights and colors to improve your swing at your pace.
pros: Build practical strength to develop a balanced swing
Can be ordered in 8-, 12-, 16-, 20-, 24-, and 28-ounce versions in green, orange, red, blue, yellow, or black depending on personal preference
cons: Green color blends into grass very well and can be easily misplaced

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR BALANCED BAT WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to develop and enhance bat swing speed. Love that Champro makes several different weights thereby accommodating all ages of users. We use these during practices and when warming up for games. I can definitely see an improvement in bat speed after using these for an entire season. Another positive is that the "doughnut" tends to emphasize a balanced bat weight while sleeve weights add more weight to the end of the barrel. Will be buying some more of these for the Fall Baseball season.
customer_reviews.author: DowntownRDB

customer_reviews.title: Not bought for a bat.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought this as a sink sprayer hose weight and it works very well for that. I thought that if league officials even found one of these in your team's gear bag you could be DQ'd for a Little League game. Perhaps they've changed the rules since I coached. But as a sink sprayer hose weight (my intended use), it's just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MLT

customer_reviews.title: Great youth weight / not-so-great youth color - easliy lost & forgotten
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 yr-old son. He loved it. Teammates loved it. Coaches loved it. The whole team passed it around. It's really the ideal weight for 9-10 year old kids. I'm giving it 4 stars because it's not easily visible in the grass. This means when they forget to pack it up after a game (as 9 yr olds often do with helmets, gloves, bats, water bottles, etc.) the coaches and parents won't see it. Yes, of course, the kids should learn to be more responsible. But this is a product review. Grass-colored youth weights are easily forgotten and lost. I'm buying the (heavier) orange weight to replace ours.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent for training
customer_reviews.text: Son's coach recommended getting these weights in green and orange to help build up strength before batting practice. They use these for the high school team, and the difference in swing speed and power is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Act162This

customer_reviews.title: Good bat weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a good weight for the kids to practice with. My son uses this all the time when he practices swinging and it has increased his bat speed and he is hitting the ball farther. It takes a lot of abuse since he is 10, but it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Beeswax

customer_reviews.title: It's a bat weight
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off the bat. Almost the same weight as my softball bat (27.5oz) making it like swinging double the weight without having to hold 2 bats (which I hate doing) so you can keep your grip and form. sometimes the weight doesn't "stick" on the barrel and can slide down when putting the bat up to start a swing
customer_reviews.author: Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: It does what bat weights do
customer_reviews.text: Not much you can say about a bat-weight. My 12 year old grandson liked it a lot. Shared it with several others on his baseball team and they all liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 8 oz. for my 8 year old grandson. We hope to increase his bat speed. The item is well constructed and fits the bat perfectly. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: gtdad

customer_reviews.title: Green model is hard to find in the grass
customer_reviews.text: Good price and quality. The 8 oz. weight is ideal for 12U youth players and the rubberized coating that protects the bat has held up well. The only issue is the color of green is identical to the color of grass making it almost impossible to find. Recommendation to the manufacture is to change the 8 oz. model's color to a high contrast fluorescent green.
customer_reviews.author: The Mouse Jockey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was adequate for my 7 year old son. It was delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the team I coach - 11 year olds. It works great and is weighted nicely and is also bright and easy to spot. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MR1LLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bat weight for various age groups. Perfect for doing over/under drills without having to have an extra heavy bat. Fits 2 5/8 and 2 3/4 with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sims

customer_reviews.title: Son loves It
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old to help improve his bat speed at the plate. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Donut weight for the younger players
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my 9 year old minor league level player. Easy on/off his bat. Good weight size. Seems fairly durable. Easy to spot in and around the dugout.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Needs a bigger diameter
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is I wish it would fit the bat better. It doesnt slide down very far. But it works good enough
customer_reviews.author: BlakeEdog

customer_reviews.title: The 12 OZ size seems just about right for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The 12 OZ size seems just about right for my son playing 6U. The orange sticks out when it's left in the grass and we collect it later.
customer_reviews.author: ceyko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: It's just enough weight for warming up. Other 1 lb. weights were too much for my son's age group.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Hard to go wrong with a bat weight, but this one feels durable and my 9-year old team likes the weight better than a heavier weight we got with our team gear.
customer_reviews.author: KCChrisD

customer_reviews.title: Grass is green so is this .....
customer_reviews.text: Great product ... seems very durable ... maybe green isn't the best color. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Castagna

customer_reviews.title: Good weight.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9 year old son. He's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool for little league.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, affordable, and effective, this works really well for my boys that play 7-9 year old little league.
customer_reviews.author: JJay

product_meta.title: Champro Bat Weight Blister Pack
product_meta.description: Champro Bat WeightSlide a Champro bat weight onto your baseball bat and, with each repetition, feel your swing get stronger and more powerful than ever.Features: * For training and warm-up to build strong swings * 2 1/4" inside diameter * 5 models: * Green: 8 oz. * Orange: 12 oz. * Red: 16 oz. * Yellow: 20 oz.
feature_bullets: Perfect Addition To Your Warm-Up Routine
Fits Bats With Barrel Sizes From 2 1/4" To 2 5/8"
Country Of Origin: Taiwan, Province Of China
